name: Puneet Punj
title: AWS & DevOps Senior Consultant
bio: Puneet is a seasoned AWS DevOps Senior Consultant with over 14 years of experience. He drives cost-effective, scalable cloud solutions and leads complex migrations using AWS, Kubernetes and Terraform.

projects.name: Cevo Australia - Cloud Transformation
projects.description: Led AWS and DevOps initiatives delivering scalable, secure cloud solutions and implementing IaC with Terraform and CloudFormation.

projects.name: Hydro Tasmania Migration
projects.description: Designed microservices and automation to migrate workloads, including SFTP integrations and serverless components.

projects.name: Jetstar Personalisation Testing Framework
projects.description: Built serverless testing framework for AWS microservices and Salesforce, improving automation coverage.
